title: Ep. 771 New Rules
description:
Summary:
We’re done playing nice. The new rules are in effect, and liberals aren’t going to like them. Also, this has been a big week for the Trump team. I cover some of their enormous victories. 
 
News Picks:
Dear Liberals, stop lying about “Democratic Socialism.” This piece thoroughly debunks their silly arguments. 
 
This Mollie Hemingway piece recaps how the media made fools of themselves with their collusion conspiracy theory
 
Evan Sayet’s piece addresses Trump’s new rules.
 
Why is Twitter shadow-banning conservatives?
 
The House finally moves against Rod Rosenstein.
 

Another huge win for Trump on trade. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
